text.text_translated: Unlike many other best-selling artists who stop making new music, Bruce Springsteen is still releasing new music. His music is popular and fills stadiums. He is still very successful, even though he is in his late 60s. This does not surprise me at all, because he is a man who tells us our most important stories about ourselves. When you listen to 'Born in the USA', those stories are as relevant today as they ever were.
